Class StudentUtilities

public class StudentUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
Utilities for working with Student objects.

      birthDate - to compare against
      Returns:
      list of students for birthDate

    • majorCounts

      public static int[] majorCounts​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> students)
      Counts the number of students in each major given in Student.GENRES.
      Parameters:
      students - list of students
      Returns:
      Number of majors across all Students.

    • readMajors

      public static java.lang.Integer[] readMajors​(java.util.Scanner keyboard)
      Asks a user to select majors from a list of majors and returns an integer list of the majors chosen.
      Parameters:
      keyboard - Keyboard input.
      Returns:
      An integer list of major codes.

    • readStudent

      public static Student readStudent​(java.lang.String line)
      Creates and returns a Student object from a line of formatted string data.
      Parameters:
      line - a vertical bar-delimited line of student data in the format id|surname|forename|birthDate|majorCodes
      Returns:
      the data from line as a Student object

    • readStudents

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Student> readStudents​(java.util.Scanner fileScanner) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Reads a list of Students from a file.
      Parameters:
      fileScanner - The file to read.
      Returns:
      A list of Student objects.
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - file not found

    • writeStudents

      public static void writeStudents​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> students, java.io.PrintStream ps)
      Writes the contents of students to a file. Overwrites or creates a new file of Student objects converted to strings.
      Parameters:
      students - List of Students.
      ps - PrintStream to write Student data to.
